NationMania.core

Class Round

  • java.lang.Object
    • NationMania.core.Round

  • public final class Round
extends java.lang.Object
    Class containing all data for current round (one round = one state)
    The data is only valid for the current game with the current player

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int NUM_STARTING_CLUES
      Configuration Constant - number of clues the player get for free every new round
      private static int penalty 
      private static int score 
      static int STARTING_CLUE_PENALTY
      Configuration Constant - determines the number of points reduced when player is asking for the first addition clue
      static int STARTING_SCORE
      Configuration Constant - the score which the player starts with every new round
      this value is multiplied by a constant according to the game difficulty.
      private static boolean success

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Round() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static int getPenalty() 
      static int getScore() 
      static boolean isSuccess() 
      static void nationFound()
      Called only if the player succeeded to find the hidden nation.
      Updates the total score with the score the player earned this round, and increase the nubmer of states discovered.
      static void reducePoints(int penalty)
      Called after player requests a new fact or continent, and reduces the number of points left for this round.
      If the player requests a fact - the penalty is 2 points more than the last fact.
      If the player requests a continent - the penalty is set to quater of the remaining round points.
      static void reportFact(int factID)
      Called after player makes a valid report - update fact on DB that has been reported.
      If fact was reported more than a certain threshold, it will not be displayed anymore.
      This action not valid for continent facts.
      static void reset()
      Called every new round.
      Resets the round parameters to their initial values
      static void setPenalty(int penalty)
      Increase the penalty every time a new fact is displayed
      static void setSuccess(boolean success)
      Called every time the player submit a guess.
      Sets the success parameter according to if the guess was correct

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • STARTING_SCORE

        public static int STARTING_SCORE
        Configuration Constant - the score which the player starts with every new round
        this value is multiplied by a constant according to the game difficulty.

      • STARTING_CLUE_PENALTY

        public static int STARTING_CLUE_PENALTY
        Configuration Constant - determines the number of points reduced when player is asking for the first addition clue

      • NUM_STARTING_CLUES

        public static int NUM_STARTING_CLUES
        Configuration Constant - number of clues the player get for free every new round

      • score

        private static int score

      • success

        private static boolean success

      • penalty

        private static int penalty

    • Constructor Detail

      • Round

        public Round()

    • Method Detail

      • reset

        public static void reset()
        Called every new round.
        Resets the round parameters to their initial values

      • getScore

        public static int getScore()
        Returns:
        round current score left for the player to gain

      • getPenalty

        public static int getPenalty()
        Returns:
        number of points reduced to the player on the next fact he requests.

      • setPenalty

        public static void setPenalty(int penalty)
        Increase the penalty every time a new fact is displayed
        Parameters:
        penalty - number of points reduced to the player for displaying last fact. The function is not called when the player asks for the continent.

      • isSuccess

        public static boolean isSuccess()
        Returns:
        true if the player guessed the right nation, meaning the name in the choose box macthes the name of the current randomized nation.

      • setSuccess

        public static void setSuccess(boolean success)
        Called every time the player submit a guess.
        Sets the success parameter according to if the guess was correct
        Parameters:
        success - true if the player guessed correctly, and false otherwise.

      • reportFact

        public static void reportFact(int factID)
        Called after player makes a valid report - update fact on DB that has been reported.
        If fact was reported more than a certain threshold, it will not be displayed anymore.
        This action not valid for continent facts.
        Parameters:
        factID - the ID of the reported fact

      • reducePoints

        public static void reducePoints(int penalty)
        Called after player requests a new fact or continent, and reduces the number of points left for this round.
        If the player requests a fact - the penalty is 2 points more than the last fact.
        If the player requests a continent - the penalty is set to quater of the remaining round points.
        Parameters:
        penalty - number of points reduced to the player

      • nationFound

        public static void nationFound()
        Called only if the player succeeded to find the hidden nation.
        Updates the total score with the score the player earned this round, and increase the nubmer of states discovered.
